item.title: Abandoned Audi car, 11th December
item.description:
The car has been here 3 months. The reason why I believe the car is abandoned is because the window is half open and there is no number plate on the vehicle.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wickham Lane, Plumstead

item.title: Waste and receptacles on Footway - Chipperfield, 11th December
item.description:
Domestic waste and receptacles have been left on the footway alongside to Chipperfield Road by lamppost 16C34 outside numbers 165-171 Chipperfield Road Please could these be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 181, Chipperfield Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 12 and 14 Plympton Avenue NW6 7TJ, 11th December
item.description:
The tree is far too big and overhangs gardens when in leaf. It needs pollarding before next spring. I've also had a major drainage problem with my main drain partly due to the tree roots.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plympton Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bush overhanging making it dangerous to turn out of junction, 11th December
item.description:
Bush over growing is blocking line of sight for cars turning out making it hard to see what's coming from the left when driver is making a right turn out of this junction onto towncourt lane. The sight line here was always difficult even before the bush over grew but now the sight line is very restricted. This is a well used junction and this bush hanging over could cause accidents
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Towncourt Lane, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
